name: flowdot
description: Connect Claude to FlowDot workflows - create, execute, and manage visual automation workflows
long_description:
FlowDot MCP Server enables Claude to interact with your FlowDot workflows directly. Build, execute, and manage visual automation workflows, custom nodes, and apps - all through natural conversation.

## Features

- **Execute Workflows**: Run your workflows with custom inputs
- **Build Workflows**: Create and modify workflows programmatically
- **Manage Custom Nodes**: Browse, create, and share custom nodes
- **App Development**: Build and deploy React apps powered by workflows
- **Analytics**: View workflow metrics and execution history

## Getting Started

1. Get your MCP token from FlowDot Settings > MCP Tokens
2. Enter your token when prompted
3. Start chatting with Claude about your workflows!
